extends org.eclipse.graphiti.features.impl.AbstractCreateConnectionFeature
implements org.eclipse.graphiti.features.ICreateConnectionFeature
    Class CreateSequentialConnectionGraphBtFeature is for creating sequential edge model of two connected BT node
    Author:
    GraphBT Team
